services.title: Services
services.intro: Tölvuhvíslarinn serves individuals and small businesses with computer repairs, custom builds, data protection, and IT consulting. Below is an overview of the services I offer.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.intro: Prices are clear and transparent. No work is performed without approval and I always honestly assess whether a repair is worth it. Unnecessary upgrades are not sold.

about.title: About Tölvuhvíslarinn
about.intro1: My name is Daði and I have been working with computers for 20 years. Tölvuhvíslarinn serves individuals and small businesses with computer repairs, upgrades, custom builds, data protection, and IT consulting.
about.intro2: I emphasize speaking in plain language, not technical jargon, and always explaining what is being done and why. Good technical support is not just about fixing things, but about helping people make better decisions and building trust for the long term.

howIWork.title: How I work
howIWork.bullet1: Honest advice – not just what sells best
howIWork.bullet2: Clear explanations of what is being done
howIWork.bullet3: No unnecessary work – sometimes the best solution is to do nothing
